roleset.name: to act as the boss of
roleset.note: BOSS-V NOTES: hand-corrected by Claire. Adjectival 'bossy' based on BOLT-7. (from boss.01-v)
BOSSY-J NOTES: Automatically created by Julia as an alias file for unification. (from bossy.01-j)

example.name: boss-v: With extent
example.text: Melinda found that she bossed him more, telling him what their plans were for the weekend, what movie she'd like to see.
example.arg: telling him what their plans were for the weekend, what movie she'd like to see

example.name: bossy-j
example.text: Our people are restrained and introverted , not as outspoken or bossy as foreigners ,

roleset.name: push around, order
roleset.note: BOSS_AROUND-V NOTES: Based on automatic frame. By Claire (from boss.02-v)

example.name: boss_around-v: With intervening arg1
example.text: To add insult to injury, she bossed him around as he helped decorate her home.
example.arg: as he helped decorate her home.
